articles.author: James Frater and Kara Fox, CNN
articles.title: Russia responsible for Alexander Litvinenko's assassination, European court rules - CNN
articles.description: Russia was responsible for killing Alexander Litvinenko, a former Russian agent turned Kremlin critic who died in London by polonium poisoning in 2006, the European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) said Tuesday.

articles.author: Kath Sullivan
articles.title: Australia's free trade deal with the EU could be in trouble after scrapping French submarines project - ABC News
articles.description: The government says it is not worried about the future of its free trade negotiations with the EU, but a European leader warns French anger may spill over into other trade deals.
articles.content: The government is "hoping and praying" French anger over Australia's decision to scrap a $90 billion submarine contract with the country will not spill over into its other trade negotiations with Eur… [+5206 chars]

articles.title: WHO recommends alcohol tax hike in Europe to fight cancer - Guardian
articles.description: The World Health Organization on Monday recommended doubling alcohol taxes in Europe as a means to prevent nearly 5,000 cancer deaths every year.
